sourceContent:
HubSpot suppress expiring auth errors

Reason: Unauthorized
HTTP response headers: HTTPHeaderDict({'Date': '<DAY_OF_WEEK>, <DATETIME>', 'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '240', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'CF-Ray': '<HEX>-IAD', 'CF-Cache-Status': 'DYNAMIC', 'Strict-Transport-Security': 'max-age=<NUMBER>; includeSubDomains; preload', 'Vary': 'origin, Accept-Encoding', 'access-control-allow-credentials': 'false', 'x-hubspot-auth-failure': '401 Unauthorized', 'x-hubspot-correlation-id': '<GUID>', 'Set-Cookie': '__cf_bm=rA3DhjrJpb3LUt7E5KmIwHg2EGnvy_CLGmO4ktKLc4o-<NUMBER>-<IPV4>-MLnM3AqxoPU35z4Ihi1m3unMMel62fcwWJWr4qfmpt5aCIeImS26kbe9PpwVoOg3tVXkt7G6KjaXf36d8oLTywqV7fEtvqB2EI1E2AyubQ0; path=/; expires=<DAY_OF_WEEK>, <DATETIME>; domain=.hubapi.com; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None', 'Report-To': '{"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v4?s=Mr567zJD%2FqK8jZrlIOwTcjkdCQSXjnjOWNNJuFoFQ1hNzbs1Jhti8Ce5i0oxwfxSlALX4tijE0F5GZqwusFa6VIplwi%2FMcHMLWUbMaikiWCrfDZ%2BMGaODELCJvYLptOs"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":<NUMBER>}', 'NEL': '{"success_fraction":0.01,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":<NUMBER>}', 'Server': 'cloudflare'})

createData.title: HubSpot suppress expiring auth errors
createData.description:
HubSpot suppress expiring auth errors

hubspot.crm.objects.tasks.exceptions:UnauthorizedException
